name: 高級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎限大三修習◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】、【ENU0289  高級寫作（一）】
description: 在「高級寫作」中，該課程旨在將學生在前兩年學到的寫作技巧，與他們對某個主題、學科或主題的知識相結合，以便為學生未來的職業生涯做好準備。本課程將使用不同類型、富有創意的文體，在不同領域進行情境化的寫作，內容可能包括與考試相關、與工作相關、或與研究論文相關的主題。以文字為主的寫作，也可能搭配其他的傳播管道，例如圖片、音頻、或個人/小組網頁等來進行。
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject
syllabus:
**COURSE OVERVIEW**

This course is a continuation of Advanced Writing I and will require more linguistic and structural analyses to form an organized essay. The work will also be larger in size, requiring more language variety overall. Some of the new challenges will include timed writing, combining reading with writing, and learning how to synthesize various sources. Genres studied and to be used will include broader and more controversial topics besides the ones covered before. Required writing also includes more thematic workbook exercises, reading reflections, simulated writing quizzes, and group work.

Course objectives

1\. Advanced English written capability:

To obtain the advanced knowledge of the English language from various written and discoursal perspectives.

2\. Professional skills of academic writing:

To obtain skills of advanced academic writing using various styles.

3\. Effective written communication: 

Besides writing with correct spelling, punctuation, and grammar; students will learn how to write with sophistication from various authentic materials to write and form their critical thinking skills.

Weekly schedule (tentative and subject to change based on our progress): 

Week 1: Course overview and introduction

Week 2: Cause and effect essays I

Week 3: Cause and effect essays II

Week 4: SOP workshop 

Week 5: Extended definition essays I

Week 6: Extended definition essays II

Week 7: SOP workshop

Week 8: Problem and solution essays I

Week 9: Problem and solution essays II

Week 10: SOP workshop

Week 11: Summary and response essays I

Week 12: Summary and response essays II

Week 13: SOP workshop

Week 14: Argumentative essays I

Week 15: Argumentative essays II

Week 16: SOP workshop

Week 17: Summary and conference (final paper & portfolio due)

Week 18: Final writing conference

methodologies.note: Student-led discussions and reports for problem solving

grading.note: Two assigned written tasks (15% for each)
